annotations.description: The Cameron’s kick first came into being from any source I can find in Harry Craddock’s Savoy Cocktail book published in 1930. A lot of you will see it for w...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Cameron's Kick

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Irish Whiskey
1oz (30ml) Scotch
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Orgeat

Shake and strain. 
Garnish with Lemon twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F9bTyxupSWs&t=0s
title: Cameron's Kick
